summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1339, for the improvement of East Madison Street, from Thirty-third Avenue North to East Mercer Street; Thirty-second Avenue North, from the alley south of East Madison Street to Washington Boulevard, and Washington Boulevard, from Thirty-second Avenue North to East Madison Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein, etc under Ordinance 14985 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
